definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: See the Buddhist holy places, and far to see iron temple, incense quite sheng. Run!
sentences.chinese: 看到佛家圣地了，远远看见铁林寺，香火蛮盛的。

definition: Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
Hinayana, the Lesser Vehicle/Buddhism in India before the Mayahana sutras/also pr. [Xiao3 cheng2]
Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)
(Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
